results.title: The anticancer effects of Metformin in the male germ tumor SEM-1 cell line are mediated by HMGA1
results.text_hl: By taking advantage of this newly established model for studying the biology of @<m>DISEASE_Male_Germ_Cell_Tumor</m> @DISEASE_MESH:C564777 @@@male GCTs@@@, herein we provide detailed in vitro evidence for a potent antiproliferative/antimigratory effect of @GENE_SLTM @GENE_79811 @@@Met@@@ in @<m>DISEASE_Male_Germ_Cell_Tumor</m> @DISEASE_MESH:C564777 @@@male GCTs@@@.

The anticancer effects of Metformin in the male germ tumor SEM-1 cell line are mediated by HMGA1 Front Endocrinol (Lausanne). 2022;13():1051988. PMID: 36506071
